channel.title: Changing colors
channel.description: When trying to make newer items or npcs how do you go about this ? like if I wanted to take the KBD and make him white. [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] wrong section[/center]

item.title: Changing colors
item.dc:creator: @Vrunk Vrunk
item.description:
@Vrunk wrote:

You originally posted this topic in Runescape Classic Server Development. This is obviously a client-related question, so it should be posted here. I did not post a re-direction topic because they clutter up the boards. That is probably the source of the confusion.

Read full topic
